name: Autumn Leaves (itch) (Moldsy)
description:
Autumn Leaves is a small puzzle platformer game where you collect colorful leaves for your friend. Jump, open doors, and reset the world around you to find them all!

Made for the Cozy Autumn 2022 Game Jam.

Made in Godot 3.5 Game Engine.

Controls:

  • Move: Arrow Keys, D-Pad, or Left Stick.
  • Jump: Up Arrow Key, Up on D-pad or L-stick, or A button (bottom button).
  • Interact/Dialogue: E Key, X button (left button), B button (right button).
  • Reset: R Key, Y button (top button), Right and Left bumpers.
  • Quit: Hold Escape Key, Hold Start Button.

Have a wonderful Fall!
